sources.title: Boys Will Be Boys (1935)
sources.description: Dr. Alec Smart (Will Hay) is a teacher in a prison. He applies for the headmaster of public school Narkover. PD In UK At GATT Date. Not Eligible For GATT Mystic Nights Videos

metadata.Plot: Will Hay is a teacher in a prison, who applies for the Headship of Narkover, a public school. This is the first screen appearance of Hay in his (to be ) famous schoolmaster role, in a story based on Dr Smart-Alec, the character created by John Cameron Andrieu Bingham Michael Morton (J.B. Morton, "Beachcomber")
metadata.Writer: J.B. Morton, Will Hay, Robert Edmunds
metadata.Actors: Will Hay, Gordon Harker, Jimmy Hanley
